snippet: The All-Star reliever Darren O’Day, 33, re-signed with the Baltimore Orioles on a four-year, $31 million contract.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles re-sign pitcher Darren O'Day to four-year, $31 million contract.
lead_paragraph: The All-Star reliever Darren O’Day, 33, re-signed with the Baltimore Orioles on a four-year, $31 million contract.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Orioles Pact for O’Day
